events.title: Ingrowing Nail with Infection
events.description: The patient was diagnosed with an ingrowing nail with infection (M2304) during a consultation. A referral to podiatry service was made, and the patient was prescribed Co-amoxiclav 500mg/125mg tablets to be taken three times a day. This condition indicates a significant risk of complications if not treated properly.

events.title: Cellulitis Diagnosis
events.description: A new episode of cellulitis (M03z0) was recorded during a consultation. This condition can lead to serious complications if not managed effectively, highlighting the need for prompt treatment and monitoring.

events.title: Asthma Control Test
events.description: The patient underwent an asthma control test, scoring 23, which indicates poor asthma control. Additionally, it was noted that the patient had one asthma exacerbation in the past year. This suggests a need for reassessment of the asthma management plan to prevent further exacerbations.
